PegSolitaire - Interface in PegSolitaireGame
The main interface of the PegSolitaire game, has the Subclass PegSolitaireEngine.
PegSolitaire.Action - Interface in PegSolitaireGame
The interface of the class that holds the information about an action.
PegSolitaire.CellState - Interface in PegSolitaireGame
The interface of the enum type that describes what states can a cell be in.
PegSolitaire.Direction - Interface in PegSolitaireGame
The interface of the enum type that describes in what direction is an action targeted to.

The class that makes the engine of the PegSolitaire game.

Default constructor.

PegSolitaireEngine.Action_Peg - Class in PegSolitaireGame
An inner class that holds the information about an action and handles the operations on them.
PegSolitaireEngine.CellState_Peg - Enum Class in PegSolitaireGame
An enum type to represent the state of a cell in the board.
PegSolitaireEngine.Direction_Peg - Enum Class in PegSolitaireGame
An enum type to represent the direction of an action.
PegSolitaireExc - Class in PegSolitaireGame
This class contains all the possible exceptions that can be produced by PegSoltaire class and it's subclasses.
PegSolitaireExc() - Constructor for class PegSolitaireGame.PegSolitaireExc
 
PegSolitaireExc.InvalidActionException - Exception in PegSolitaireGame
Thrown when an action that doesn't meet the requirments of a valid action is used .
PegSolitaireExc.InvalidBoardTypeException - Exception in PegSolitaireGame
Thrown when a board type index is given that is out of the bounds of the board types list.
PegSolitaireExc.InvalidDirectionException - Exception in PegSolitaireGame
Thrown when the start and the destination points of the action can not be represented by one of the four valid directions (Up, Down, Left, Right), which means that the destination point is two cells away from the start point in one of the four directions.
PegSolitaireExc.InvalidSaveFileNameException - Exception in PegSolitaireGame
Thrown when a invalid file name is given to load a game from it.
PegSolitaireExc.NoActionsToUndoException - Exception in PegSolitaireGame
Thrown when an undo command is given but no previous action is recorded.
PegSolitaireExc.OutofBoundsException - Exception in PegSolitaireGame
Thrown when coordinates that exceed the board's bounds are used.
